title: Happy New Year, Please Go Out with Me - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Curses   Female Protagonist   Forgetful Protagonist   Magic   Modern Day   Oneshot   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Witches
author: Kokui Nagi   告井 凪
description:
To be able to confess well.

My friend, the “Witch” Maho-chan, gave me a spell..

However, after the spell. When you meet the person you like, you have to confess with your first words.

I thought it was easy.

…… New Year’s greetings are important, aren’t they?>
